sentences.sContent: It is an invariable rule of auto design and engineering: Cars get bigger with age.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is an invariable rule of auto design and engineering: Cars get bigger with age.
sentences.sCn: 汽车设计与工程领域里有条不变的法则：越是新出的车越大。

sentences.sContent: There's always, and I think this is nearly invariable -there's an element in Milton's similes that stands outside the framework of the basic comparison.
sentences.sContent_eng: There's always, and I think this is nearly invariable -there's an element in Milton's similes that stands outside the framework of the basic comparison.
sentences.sCn: 有一点是时常出现并且几乎不变的,-就是在弥尔顿的明喻中始终有一个元素,是从基本的对比框架中脱颖而出的。

words.tran: [数] 不变量；[计] 不变式
